channel.title: Jun Woo Shin
channel.description: Recent content on Jun Woo Shin

item.title: Done with School
item.description: After spending nearly your whole life doing something, it’s kind of weird to just stop. Sure, school sucked but it just sort of became a part of my life.

item.title: Leaving Work
item.description: There’s a certain sadness in leaving a job. Sure it’s not graduating from school or leaving a close group of friends, but nevertheless each time I feel a bit melancholy.

item.title: Recruiting
item.description: At the end of my summer, I realized with dread that I hadn’t done any studying for interviews at all or started looking for jobs at all.

item.title: hackNY 2017
item.description: Itâ€™s currently 2:00 AM, August 12th, 2017 - just a full week since hackNY officially ended.

item.title: Frontend Please
item.description: Ever since I finally got around to uninstalling Lazarus, I had determined that I would make an extension to fulfill the void that it left.

item.title: Android
item.description: My first phone was a Motorola Razer, I’m sure you have fond memory of those. After that it was the sidekick LX and then a Blackberry.

item.title: Themes
item.description: For as long as I can remember, theming was very important to me. Aesthetics. My idea was that if I were going to use something, it should look nice so that I would enjoy using it.

item.title: Asthma
item.description: It was a cold day and I could feel my feet beginning to get cold. A little itch began to creep up my throat, bringing out a small cough - much better.

item.title: I'm Kind of Lazy
item.description: I’ve never considered myself to be especially unhealthy or not fit. There was a period in time in which I rarely went outside around early elementary school days, but besides that I was actively going out to play.

item.title: Pocketistic
item.description: I like to think that I am a decent reader - Pocket certainly seemed to think so.

item.title: Reviving the Blog
item.description: It’s been a few months since my last post because I’ve just been so busy with school.

item.title: Another New Computer
item.description: After dealing with a very old and sluggish desktop for a long time, I finally had enough and decided to build my own computer.

item.title: New Computer
item.description: I’ve always been into computers, but interestingly enough I never bought a good one that I actually wanted.

item.title: Why doesn't my school encourage learning?
item.description: I’m a freshman in NYU Tandon School of Engineering. As a computer science major, I was excited to find that I would be taking Python in my first semester, a language that I had some experience with already.

item.title: Spread Too Thin
item.description: Ever since I could remember, I was always so ambitious. There were so many things that I wanted to do and so many things that I wanted to learn.

item.title: GitHub Blog
item.description: I’ve been meaning to make blog using GitHub’s built in system using Jekyll. But of course I got distracted and never quite got around to it.
